title: Narcotics file: the source
creator_credit: Pierre Desbonnet, Journal Films and United Nations Television
brief_description: Deals with Thailand’s part in the “Golden Triangle” which originates about half the world’s illicit opium supply. Here a joint UN-Thai Government project is attempting to provide alternative cash crops for the hill tribes who earn what little money they have from the cultivation of the opium poppy.
